login_failed: Login failed. Please check your credentials.
logout_success: You have been logged out successfully.
signup_failed: Failed to create account. Try again later.
order_placed: Your order has been placed successfully!
order_failed: Failed to place order. Please try again.
order_out_for_delivery: Your order is out for delivery.
payment_failed: Payment failed. Please try another method.
something_went_wrong: Something went wrong. Please try again later.
INACTIVITY_BLOCK_MSG: This user was blocked automatically due to no inactivity.
WRONG_PASSWORD_ATTEMPTS_MSG: This user was blocked automatically after entering the wrong password consecutively 10 times.
NOT_ASSOCIATED: There isn't any account associated with this email.
OLD_NEW_PASSWORD_CANNOT_BE_SAME: Old And New Password cannot be same.
INVALID_CREDENTIALS: Either your email or password is incorrect
ACCOUNT_BLOCKED_DUE_TO_INVALID_ATTEMPTS: Your account is blocked because of invalid attempts!
ACCOUNT_BLOCKED_BY_ADMIN: Your account has been  blocked by admin!
ACCOUNT_DELETED_BY_ADMIN: Your account has been deleted by admin!
INACTIVE_EMAIL: Your email is not activated yet.
TOKEN_EXPIRED_LOGIN_AGAIN: Invalid/Expired verification token! Please login again
USER_EMAIL_PHONE_NOT_EXIST: We cannot find an account with entered email or phone address. Please create your account.
RESET_LINK_SENT: The reset password mail has been sent successfully.
PASSWORD_SHOULD_BE_DISTINCT: Password should be distinct from last 3 passwords!
INVALID_TOKEN: Your Session has expired. Please logout and login again.
DUPLICATE_NAME: The given name is already in use.
DATA_ADDED: The data has been added successfully.
DATA_UPDATED: The data has been updated successfully.
ALREADY_IN_USE: The name you entered already exists.
EMAIL_OR_PHONE_IN_USE: Email or Phone has already been taken.
ACCOUNT_UNDER_REVIEW: Thank you for registering! Your account is currently under review. We will notify you via email once your account has been approved.
